author: @beaureguard9107
text: The name Laos is pronounced without enunciating the s. I know because I was sternly corrected by a co-worker from there, who fled the US bombings of his country in the early seventies.

replies.text: I've herd actual Laotians say it with an 'S'

replies.author: @beaureguard9107
replies.text:
@antediluvianatheist5262 "Actual Laotians", lol.

To the contrary, there is no such name as "Laotian". The country is called Laos, without enunciating the s, and the people are called Laos, again, without enunciating the s.

author: @ERRATAS0707
text: What's your opinion on China illegally occupying the islands and territorial waters of the Philippines and harassing Southeast Asian fishermen and women?

replies.author: @MTanks24
replies.text: The Philippines are being used by AUKUS to militarily encircle China, China is responding to the aggression and military build up by them, and idk about 'harassing fishermen' I would be highly skeptical of media narratives around this from the west...

replies.author: @ERRATAS0707
replies.text:
@MTanks24 it is true because I've seen it, it's my people. They're blocking our fishermen, big warships using water cannons at our fishermen and all they do is just get some fish that they can sell and cook for their families.

I get that other countries have other agendas about this, but why do normal people like our fishermen are always getting hurt? I want people like you to share your thoughts and see if the anti-commies are telling the truth.

replies.author: @Yo‡™™C‡™µnNOTvot‡™¶O‡™™tF‡™µ‡™°ci‡™°m

replies.author: @beaureguard9107
replies.text: Maritime disputes are common throughout the world. Don't make more of that one than any other. The real difference, is that it is being exacerbated by the US empire in pursuit of its geostrategic aims.

replies.text:

I'm pretty sure you think that's not right.

replies.author: @ERRATAS0707
replies.text: @beaureguard9107 I know the US has their own interest in our country, but in our point of view China is the aggressor. They're targeting Filipino fishermen on small boats and they're just getting food for their families.
